mapper.sql: ID, SUBJECT_ID,GRADE_SCOPE_ID, MIDDEL_RATIO, END_RATIO, USUAL_RATIO, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATER
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_scores_rule_config
ID,
SUBJECT_ID,
GRADE_SCOPE_ID,
MIDDEL_RATIO,
END_RATIO,
USUAL_RATIO,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATOR,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATER,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gradeScopeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{middelRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{endRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{usualRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_scores_rule_config
SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE_SCOPE_ID = #{gradeScopeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIDDEL_RATIO = #{middelRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
END_RATIO = #{endRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
USUAL_RATIO = #{usualRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_scores_rule_config set SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE_SCOPE_ID = #{gradeScopeId,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MIDDEL_RATIO = #{middelRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, END_RATIO = #{endRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, USUAL_RATIO = #{usualRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select src.*,sj.name as subjectName, gs.NAME as scopeName, sj.id as subjectId from sys_scores_rule_config src ,sys_subject_info sj,sys_scores_rule_grade_scope gs where sj.id = src.SUBJECT_ID and gs.id = src.GRADE_SCOPE_ID
and sj.id = #{queryparam.subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
,(select name from sys_subject_info sj where sj.id = src.SUBJECT_ID) as subjectName ,(select id from sys_scores_rule_grade_scope gs where gs.id = src.GRADE_SCOPE_ID) as gradeScopeId ,(select scope from sys_scores_rule_grade_scope gs where gs.id = src.GRADE_SCOPE_ID) as scope from sys_scores_rule_config src where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
,(select name from sys_subject_info sj where sj.id = src.SUBJECT_ID) as subjectName from sys_scores_rule_config src where SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select es.* ,(select name from tch_class_info where id=es.class_id) classText from sco_exam_scores es,tch_course_open co,tch_course c where es.COURSE_OPEN_ID = co.id and co.COURSE_ID = c.id and c.SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and es.SCHOOL_YEAR = #{schoolYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and es.term = #{term,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select es.*,co.GRADE as grade ,es.class_name as classText from sco_exam_scores es,tch_course_open co,tch_course c where es.COURSE_OPEN_ID = co.id and co.COURSE_ID = c.id and c.SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and es.SCHOOL_YEAR = #{schoolYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and es.term = #{term,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and co.GRADE in
#{item}

select es.*,co.GRADE as grade ,es.class_name as classText from sco_exam_scores es,tch_course_open co,tch_course c where es.COURSE_OPEN_ID = co.id and co.COURSE_ID = c.id and es.TYPE = #{scoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and es.COURSE_OPEN_ID = #{openCourseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
